resources.string: The story of the bloody battle of Thermopylae in 480 BC. e., in which three hundred brave Spartans, led by King Leonidas, blocked the path of the army of the Persian king Xerxes.

Former Marine Jake Sully is wheelchair-bound. Despite his weak body, Jake is still a warrior at heart. He is given the task of making a journey of several light years to the base of earthlings on the planet Pandora, where corporations are mining a rare mineral that is of great importance for the Earth\'s exit from the energy crisis.

Sauron, the lord of the forces of darkness, sends his countless army under the walls of Minas Tirith, the fortress of Light\'s Hope. He looks forward to a close victory, but this is what prevents him from noticing two tiny figures - hobbits approaching Mount Doom, where they have to destroy the Ring of Omnipotence.
